body: I think KEN should stick to his original Boku Dake story... Much better. @zspecter you can find the order in a few of his own doujins, though it is never complete
This is out of topic, but anyone here know the correct order of the "Boku dake no Bakunyuu Ona Maid"? you know, the history about the guy with a blonde girlfriend and a teacher(sensei)?
